title: Wartime farming in the corn belt
brief_description: A World War II film showing American farmers using conservation methods to produce more food and to better utilise natural resources. Part of the ‘Food for Freedom’ program effort.
description: A World War II film showing American farmers using conservation methods to produce more food and to better utilise natural resources. Part of the ‘Food for Freedom’ program effort.
